name: TorrentiumAPI
description: The backend for Torrentium Android App.

RCLONE_REMOTE.description: Rclone remote config, please copy from `rclone config show`, make sure to not copy the remote name.

APP_NAME.description: Please enter your APP_NAME, This will pings your app every 10 minutes to prevent it from sleeping. Leave empty if you don't want to use it.
